sentence: In early trading on Thursday, shares of Goldman Sachs Group ( GS ) topped the list of the day's best performing Dow Jones Industrial Average components, trading up 3.0%.
Year to date, Goldman Sachs Group registers a 7.5% gain.
And the worst performing Dow component thus far on the day is Procter & Gamble ( PG ), trading down 0.1%.
Procter & Gamble is showing a gain of 11.4% looking at the year to date performance.
Two other components making moves today are McDonald's ( MCD ), trading up 0.1%, and Cisco Systems ( CSCO ), trading up 2.0% on the day.
The views and opinions expressed herein are the views and opinions of the author and do not necessarily reflect those of Nasdaq, Inc.
